t: Cocteau Twins - Heaven or Las Vegas - Amazon.com Music
s: Cocteau Twins - Heaven or Las Vegas - Interesting album and am glad I bought it. ... The "Heaven or Las Vegas" vinyl by Cocteau Twins is a true masterpiece. The ethereal sounds of Elizabeth Fraser's vocals, paired with the dreamy instrumentals, are perfectly captured in this vinyl edition.
